stakeholders.name: Safaricom Product Development Team
stakeholders.interests: Ensuring the new location-based feature integrates smoothly into the existing M-Pesa app ecosystem and aligns with Safaricom's quality and security standards.

stakeholders.name: Stall Owners
stakeholders.interests: Increasing ease and accuracy of payment processing at their stalls and ensuring that customers can locate their business accurately in the app to reduce payment errors.

stakeholders.name: Matatu Operators
stakeholders.interests: Enabling convenient and fast fare collection by passengers while avoiding fraudulent or incorrect payments and ensuring accuracy for moving vehicles.

stakeholders.name: M-Pesa Users
stakeholders.interests: Effortlessly locating and paying for goods and services at nearby stalls or paying fare in matatus with accuracy and security.

stakeholders.name: Customer Support Team
stakeholders.interests: Providing assistance to users and resolving issues related to misdirected payments, user interface concerns, and ensuring an optimal experience with the new feature.

stakeholders.name: Regulatory Bodies
stakeholders.interests: Ensuring that the location-based payment feature adheres to legal and regulatory standards around payment security, data privacy, and transaction compliance.
